text: ان فى ذلك لءاية وما كان اكثرهم مؤمنين

translations.translation: There is certainly a Sign in that, yet most of them are not muminun.
Verily in this was a sign, but most of them do not believe.
Surely there is a Sign in this, but most of them would not believe.
In this there is an evidence of the Truth, but many of them did not have any faith.
Indeed in this is a sign; and most of them were not Muslims.
Verily, in this is indeed a sign, yet most of them are not believers.
Most surely there is a sign in this, but most of them do not believe.
Surely in that is a sign, yet most of them are not believers.
Lo! herein is indeed a portent; yet most of them are not believers.
Surely, in this is indeed a sign; but most of them would not believe:
Verily herein is a sign; but most of them are not believers.
There is indeed a sign in that; but most of them do not have faith.
Verily in that is a Sign: but most of them do not believe.
Verily, in this is indeed a sign, yet most of them are not believers.
Surely, in that there is a sign; yet most of them do not believe.
Surely in this is a sign, but most of them are not believers.
Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
[26:190] Surely in that there is a sign; but most of them are not believers.

commentaries.author: ابن عباس
commentaries.text: إِنَّ فِي ذَلِكَ لَآَيَةً وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُمْ مُؤْمِنِينَ (190) أي في ذلك آية لكفار قريش إذ كان حالهم كحال أصحاب لَيْكة فقد كانوا من المطففين مع الإشراك قال تعالى : { ويل للمطففين } إلى قوله : { ليوم عظيم } \[ المطففين : 1 5 \] . وقد تقدم القول في نظائره . وقد ذكرنا في طالعة هذه السورة ( 8 ) وجه تكرير آية { إن في ذلك لآية . }

translations.translation: (Lo! Herein) in that which We did to them (is indeed a portent) a sign and an admonition for those who came after them; (yet most of them are not believers) they were not believers and most of them were disbelievers.
